channel.title: Loudspeakers, Mixers and Stageboxes on FishLasers
channel.description: Recent content in Loudspeakers, Mixers and Stageboxes on FishLasers

item.title: Minirig 3
item.description: Rugged battery speaker. Ideal for rehearsals, personal monitoring and special FX. 3.5mm and BT input.

item.title: Yamaha 01V96i
item.description: Compact but powerful 32-channel, 8-bus, 8-aux digital mixer. 16x16 USB interface. 12 local preamps. Perfect for medium-scale shows, such as garden musicals, black-box shows, musical tours and immersive theatre. Optional Dante card available, allowing expansion using our Tio1608-D.

item.title: Yamaha Tio1608-D
item.description:
Perfect as a stagebox or I/O expander with the 01v96i and its MY-AUD Dante card, the Tio1608-D stagebox can add 16 microphone or line-level inputs to a Dante network, as well as 8 returns for monitors, recording and IEM usage.

Also works well as an audio interface with Dante Virtual Soundcard.

Can be supplied with Cat5e cables of various lengths or a Cat6 drum.
